name: @debrief/shared-types
description: Shared types for Debrief ecosystem with constrained GeoJSON FeatureCollections

scripts.build:ts: pnpm build:ts:featurecollection && pnpm build:ts:track && pnpm build:ts:point && pnpm build:ts:annotation && pnpm build:ts:states
scripts.build:ts:featurecollection: npx json-schema-to-typescript schema/featurecollection.schema.json --cwd schema/ > derived/typescript/featurecollection.ts && echo '\n// Union type for all Debrief feature types\nexport type DebriefFeature = DebriefTrackFeature | DebriefPointFeature | DebriefAnnotationFeature;' >> derived/typescript/featurecollection.ts
scripts.build:ts:re-export: echo "// Re-export from featurecollection to avoid duplication\nexport { Debrief${INTERFACE_NAME}Feature } from \"./featurecollection\";" > derived/typescript/${FILE_NAME}.ts
scripts.build:ts:states: pnpm build:ts:timestate && pnpm build:ts:viewportstate && pnpm build:ts:selectionstate && pnpm build:ts:editorstate
scripts.build:python: pnpm build:python:track && pnpm build:python:point && pnpm build:python:annotation && pnpm build:python:featurecollection && pnpm build:python:states
scripts.build:python:states: pnpm build:python:timestate && pnpm build:python:viewportstate && pnpm build:python:selectionstate && pnpm build:python:editorstate
scripts.build:dist: pnpm build:types && mkdir -p dist && npx tsc
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npx nodemon --watch schema --watch schemas --ext 'json' --exec 'pnpm build:types'" "npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.test: pnpm test:generated && pnpm test:validators && pnpm test:schemas
scripts.validate: pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpm lint

author: Debrief Team
